write_json[source]

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class AttrDict[source]

AttrDict(value=None) :: dict

Caution!! AttrDict Replaces - in keys with _

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

pretty_json[source]

pretty_json(i, fpath=None, indent=4)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
x = {'a': {'b': 10, 'c': 11}, 'd': {'e': {'f': [2, 3, 2.234]}}}

y = AttrDict(x)

assert y.a.b == 10
assert y.d.e.f == [2,3,2.234]

y.d.e.g = 11

assert y.to_dict() == {'a': {'b': 10, 'c': 11}, 'd': {'e': {'f': [2, 3, 2.234], 'g': 11}}}

y.pretty()

2021-08-17 10:55:06.872 | DEBUG    | __main__:pretty:59 - 
{
    "a": {
        "b": 10,
        "c": 11
    },
    "d": {
        "e": {
            "f": [
                2,
                3,
                2.234
            ],
            "g": 11
        }
    }
}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
d = [1,{1:1,2:2},3]

pretty_json({1:1,2:2})
pretty_json(d)

f = write_json(d, '/tmp/test.json')

assert read_json(f) == [1, {'1': 1, '2': 2}, 3]
f.rm(confirm_prompt=False);

2021-08-17 10:55:06.882 | DEBUG    | __main__:<module>:3 -

    "2": 2
}

read_yaml[source]

read_yaml(file)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

write_yaml[source]

write_yaml(content, fpath)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%%writefile test.yaml
 doe: "a deer, a female deer"
 ray: "a drop of golden sun"
 pi: 3.14159
 xmas: true
 french-hens: 3
 calling-birds:
   - huey
   - dewey
   - louie
   - fred
 xmas-fifth-day:
   calling-birds: four
   french-hens: 3
   golden-rings: 5
   partridges:
     count: 1
     my-location: "a pear tree"
   turtle-doves: two

Overwriting test.yaml
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
x = read_yaml('test.yaml') 

assert x == {'doe': 'a deer, a female deer',
 'ray': 'a drop of golden sun',
 'pi': 3.14159,
 'xmas': True,
 'french-hens': 3,
 'calling-birds': ['huey', 'dewey', 'louie', 'fred'],
 'xmas-fifth-day': {'calling-birds': 'four',
  'french-hens': 3,
  'golden-rings': 5,
  'partridges': {'count': 1, 'my-location': 'a pear tree'},
  'turtle-doves': 'two'}}

x = AttrDict(x)
assert x.ray == 'a drop of golden sun'
assert x.xmas_fifth_day.calling_birds == 'four'
assert x.xmas_fifth_day.partridges.my_location == 'a pear tree'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
write_yaml(x.to_dict(), 'test.yaml')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%cat test.yaml

calling_birds:
- huey
- dewey
- louie
- fred
doe: a deer, a female deer
french_hens: 3
pi: 3.14159
ray: a drop of golden sun
xmas: true
xmas_fifth_day:
  calling_birds: four
  french_hens: 3
  golden_rings: 5
  partridges:
    count: 1
    my_location: a pear tree
  turtle_doves: two
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
P('test.yaml').rm(confirm_prompt=False)

2021-08-17 11:20:49.842 | INFO     | torch_snippets.paths:rm:75 - Deleted test.yaml
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
config = Config()
x = config.from_str('''
[data]
dir = /root

[training]

[training.data]
dir = ${data.dir}/train

[training.scheme]
epochs = 10

[training.scheme.optimizer]
lr = 1e-3
type = float
lr-type = cyclic

[testing]
dir = ${data.dir}/test

[validation]
dir = ${testing.dir}
''')

x = AttrDict(x)
assert x.data.dir == '/root'
assert x.training.scheme.epochs == 10
assert x.training.scheme.optimizer.lr == 1e-3
assert x.training.scheme.optimizer.lr_type == 'cyclic'
assert x.testing.dir == x.validation.dir == '/root/test'
{% endraw %}
